article_title: Glaxo Fires More Than 100 Employees in China
article_text:
GlaxoSmithKline PLC said it is firing about 110 employees in China for what it describes as misconduct, the latest fallout from a bribery scandal there that has dogged the U.K. drug company for more than a year.

The move comes six months after a Glaxo subsidiary in China was found guilty by a Chinese court of bribing doctors, hospitals and other nongovernment personnel and fined more than $490 million. A Glaxo spokeswoman said on...
